info.title: (Deprecated) Online Management API for Microsoft Dataverse
info.description: The REST API provides the ability to manage the Dataverse environments in an Office 365 tenant.

get.summary: Retrieves currencies in a Dataverse environment. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
get.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

200.description: List of available currencies in a Dataverse environment.

get.summary: Retrieves all backups of a Dataverse environment. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
get.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: Instance ID for retrieving the backups.

200.description: List of backups available for a Dataverse environment.

post.summary: Backs up a Dataverse environment. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
post.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

parameters.name: backupInfo
parameters.description: Object containing information about the backup.

400.description: There was an issue either validating or starting the backup operation.

get.summary: Retrieves a Dataverse environment backup based on the restore point. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
get.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: Id of the instance to retrieve the backup from.

parameters.name: restorePointId
parameters.description: Restore point of an existing instance backup.

get.summary: Retrieves all Dataverse environments in your Office 365 tenant. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
get.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

200.description: List of Dataverse environments retrieved from your Office 365 tenant.

get.summary: Retrieves a Dataverse environment in your Office 365 tenant. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
get.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of an instance to retrieve.

put.summary: Provisions (creates) a Dataverse environment in your Office 365 tenant. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
put.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

parameters.name: newInstance
parameters.description: Allowed state for the new environment.

parameters.name: validate
parameters.description: Indicates whether to validate or create an instance. Set True to validate; set False to create.

200.description: If validate was set, validation was successful. If validation was not set, the instance was provisioned without requiring an operation.

400.description: There was an issue either validating or starting the provision operation.

errors.subject: ProvisioningJobCreation
errors.description: There was an error creating the provisioning job.

post.summary: Resets a Dataverse environment in your Office 365 tenant. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
post.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

parameters.name: targetInstanceId
parameters.description: ID of the Dataverse environment that you want to reset.

400.description: There was an issue either validating or starting the reset operation

post.summary: Restores a Dataverse environment in your Office 365 tenant. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
post.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

parameters.name: targetInstanceId
parameters.description: ID of the Dataverse environment that you want to restore.

parameters.name: instanceRestorePoint
parameters.description: The restore point of an existing instance backup.

400.description: There was an issue either validating or starting the restore operation.

post.summary: Force applies a user on a Dataverse environment. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
post.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Dataverse environment to force apply the user.

parameters.name: userObjectId
parameters.description: UserObjectID of the user to force apply on the instance.

400.description: There was an issue either validating or starting the ApplyUser operation.

post.summary: Updates the Admin Mode settings of a Dataverse environment. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
post.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Dataverse environment to update the admin mode settings.

parameters.name: adminModeSettings
parameters.description: The admin mode settings to update.

parameters.name: validate
parameters.description: Indicates whether to validate or update an instance. Set True to validate; set False to update.

200.description: Update Instance Admin Mode Operation Executed.

400.description: There was an issue either validating or executing the update admin mode update operation.

post.summary: Updates instance settings for the specified Dataverse environment. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
post.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the instance to update the settings.

parameters.name: settings
parameters.description: The instance settings to update.

parameters.name: validate
parameters.description: Indicates whether to validate or update an instance. Set True to validate; set False to update.

400.description: There was an issue either validating or executing the configure instance operation.

delete.summary: Deletes a Dataverse environment in your Office 365 tenant. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
delete.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Dataverse environment to delete.

parameters.name: validate
parameters.description: Indicates whether to validate or delete an instance. Set True to validate; set False to delete.

200.description: If validate was set, validation was executed.

400.description: There was an issue either validating or starting the delete operation.

get.summary: Retrieve information about all the environment types in Dataverse. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
get.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

get.summary: Retrieve information about a Dataverse environment type. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
get.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: An instance type

get.summary: Retrieves available tenant protection (encryption) keys. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
get.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

200.description: List of available tenant protection keys

get.summary: Retrieves the current tenant protection (encryption) key. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
get.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

post.summary: Imports tenant protection (encryption) key. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
post.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

parameters.name: importKeyData
parameters.description: The key data to import

400.description: There was an issue when either validating or importing the key

errors.subject: ImportKey
errors.description: There was an error validating or importing the key.

post.summary: Generates tenant protection (encryption) key. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
post.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

parameters.name: generateKeyData
parameters.description: Set of values required for generating the tenant protection (encryption) key

post.summary: Sets the tenant protection (encryption) key. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
post.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

parameters.name: keyName
parameters.description: The name of the key being set

202.description: Set Tenant Protection Key operation started

400.description: There was an issue with either validating or setting the tenant protection key

get.summary: Retrieves languages supported by Dataverse instance. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
get.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

parameters.name: releaseId
parameters.description: ID of the release of Dataverse.

get.summary: Retrieves notifications from the Notification service. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
get.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

parameters.name: userObjectId
parameters.description: The userObjectId, which is the same as the adminId.

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant.

parameters.name: environments
parameters.description: IDs of the instances you want notifications for.

post.summary: Post user notifications to the Notification service. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
post.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

parameters.name: userNotification
parameters.description: The user notification to be posted.

400.description: There was an issue either validating or starting the PostUserNotification operation.

get.summary: Retrieves status of an operation in your Dataverse environment. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
get.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the operation to get the status for.

get.summary: Retrieves operation status of a Dataverse environment. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
get.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

get.summary: Retrieves information about all the supported releases for Dataverse. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
get.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

get.summary: Retrieves templates supported for provisioning a Dataverse environment. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
get.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

get.summary: Retrieves all Tenant Application Identities for a tenant. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
get.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/dynamics365/customer-engagement/developer/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api.#service-url)

200.description: List of tenant application identities for a tenant.

post.summary: Registers a tenant application identity to be used with Online Management API. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
post.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

get.summary: Retrieves a Tenant Application Identity. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
get.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of a Tenant Application Identity to retrieve.

delete.summary: Deletes a Tenant Application Identity. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
delete.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

post.summary: Enables a Tenant Application Identity. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
post.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

post.summary: Disables a Tenant Application Identity. This API is [deprecated](/power-platform/important-changes-coming#online-management-api-powershell-module-and-rest-api-are-deprecated).
post.description: For a list of region-specific service URLs, see [Service URL](/powerapps/developer/data-platform/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api#service-url)

Code.description: Code of the Currency in Dataverse

Precision.description: Precision of the Currency in Dataverse

Symbol.description: Symbol of the Currency in Dataverse

Name.description: Name of the Currency in Dataverse

InstanceBackup.description: An object defining the instance backup

CreatedBy.description: User who created the instance backup

CreatedOn.description: Date and time of the creation of the instance backup

ExpiresOn.description: Expiration date and time of the instance backup

Notes.description: Notes associated with the instance backup

AzureStorage.description: For internal use only. Azure storage is not supported.

InstanceId.description: ID of the instance to backup.

Label.description: Label to help identify this backup for future restoration.

Notes.description: Notes to help identify this backup for future restoration.

Errors.description: Set of values to display errors during an operation

Information.description: Set of values to display information during an operation

ItemDescription.description: Set of values to define an error or information item

additionalProperties.description: An object defining additional properties for an item

ApplicationUrl.description: URL to the web application of the instance

ApiUrl.description: URL of the Web API for the instance

StateIsSupportedForDelete.description: Indicates whether the instance can be deleted

AdminMode.description: Indicates whether the instance is in admin mode

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the instance is locked

ProtectionStatus.description: Indicated whether the instance is Microsoft or Tenant encrypted

DomainName.description: Public domain name of the instance.

BaseLanguage.description: Base language code for the instance

InitialUserEmail.description: The object id of the user that created the instance

SecurityGroupId.description: Security group set for the instance.

NewInstance.description: The set of instance values that will be used to create a new instance

Currency.description: The Currency settings for the instance

ServiceVersionId.description: ID of the available service to use for the new instance

Templates.description: The set of templates to be used when creating a new instance

FriendlyName.description: The friendly name of the instance.

DomainName.description: The public domain name of the instance.

BaseLanguage.description: The base language code for the instance

InitialUserEmail.description: The object ID of the user who created the instance.

SecurityGroupId.description: The (optional) security group set for the instance.

LockTenantKeyData.description: The set of values to lock the tenant protection key

KeyName.description: Name of the protection key to lock

FriendlyName.description:
Friendly name of the instance.
This value is from the required "Name" input of the Copy UI and is mapped to OrganizationLifecycle.OrganizationFriendlyName in Geo config db.

SecurityGroupId.description:
ID of the security group for which members will sync to this instance
This value is from the optional Security Group input of the Copy UI and is mapped to OrganizationLifecycle.SecurityGroup in Geo config db.

FriendlyName.description:
Friendly name of the instance.
This value is from the required "Name" input of the Reset UI and is mapped to OrganizationLifecycle.OrganizationFriendlyName in Geo config db.

DomainName.description:
The domain name portion for the org in the org URL, such as "contoso".
This value is from the required "URL" input of the Reset UI and is mapped to OrganizationLifecycle.DomainName in Geo config db.

Purpose.description:
Purpose specified for this instance in the Rest UI.
This value is from the optional "Purpose" input of the Reset UI and is mapped to OrganizationLifecycle.Purpose in Geo config db.

SecurityGroupId.description:
Guid of the security group for which members will sync to this instance
This value is from the optional Security Group input of the Reset UI and is mapped to OrganizationLifecycle.SecurityGroup in Geo config db.

TargetRelease.description:
The name of the target release.
This is mapped a specific ReleaseName defined in ScaleGroupReleases table.

BaseLanguageCode.description:
Base language code LCID of the new instance
For example, 1033 for English.

ApplicationNames.description: Applications to have installed initially for the new instance.

PreferredCulture.description: Indicates if the customer prefers a certain culture for formatting for the new instance.

InstanceBackupId.description: The Id of a legacy instance backup to use.  If set, this will be used instead of Label or RestorePoint.

Label.description: The label of an existing instance backup to use.  If set, this will be used instead of RestorePoint.

CreatedOn.description: The CreatedOn date and time of an existing instance backup to use.

OverrideUserObjectId.description: If set, will be used instead of the UserObjectID of the calling user.

AdminMode.description: Indicates whether to enable or disable the Admin Mode settings.

BackgroundOperationsEnabled.description: Indicates whether to enable or disable the background operations.

DomainNameSettings.description: An object defining the domain name settings

AdditionalProperties.description: An object defining additional properties for the domain

InstanceTypeInfo.description: Object containing the information about the instance type

Total.description: Total storage capacity for the instance

Consumed.description: Consumed storage capacity for the instance

Key.description: Set of values to define a tenant protection (encryption) key

TenantId.description: ID of the tenant where the key is present

CreatedOn.description: Date on which the key was created

LockedOn.description: Date on which the key was locked

ImportKeyData.description: Set of values to import a tenant protection (encryption) key

KeyName.description: The name of the key to import

KeyType.description: The type of the key to import

KeyPassword.description: The password of the key to import

Key.description: The raw data of the key certificate as a byte array

GenerateKeyData.description: Set of values required for generating the tenant protection (encryption) key

SubjectName.description: Subject name for the protection key

Language.description: Set of values required for defining a language

EnvironmentMetadata.description: A representation of an environment metadata of an user notification.

Geo.description: Geographic location of the environment metadata

UserNotification.description: A representation of a notification that has been retrieved from or already exists in the Notification Service

AdminId.description: ID of the admin associated with the notification

TenantId.description: ID of the tenant associated with the notification

CreatedAt.description: The date and time of when the notification was created.

Environments.description: The environments associated with the notification.

OrgId.description: The id of the org associated with the notification.

Content.description: The content associated with the notification.

NotificationContent.description: A representation of the content associated with a notification.

TemplateId.description: The id of the template associated with this NotificationContent.

TemplateType.description: The type of the template associated with this NotificationContent.

Slugs.description: The slugs to be populated into the NotificationContent.

ServiceVersion.description: Set of values to define a service (release) version

Template.description: Set of values to define a template

SupportedReleases.description: Set of values to define supported releases

TenantApplicationIdentity.description: Set of values to define Tenant Application Identity

Id.description: ID of the Tenant Application Identity

Enabled.description: Indicates whether the Tenant Application Identity is enabled
